txt.en:
The end is coming, and I am nothing but a tired, lonely old man. Have I failed as a father? What curse lies upon us? Will you not come to see me? I would tell you that you are both my favourite, that you are both beloved.

If you are reading this, Sigun or Sigmar, then I am dead, and you did not come until it was too late. I only hope that you are caring for the house as you should always have done.

The deed, yes. The notary has signed it, and it is in the lockbox. The fourth colour is the one you have not chosen yet.
